00022 scaling_pair ValuePtrBase::getScaling( const scaling_pair &scaling, short unsigned int ID )const
00023 {
00024     if( scaling.first.isEmpty() || scaling.second.isEmpty() )
00025         return getScalingTo( ID );
00026     else
00027         return scaling;
00028 }

00041 void ValuePtrBase::DelProxy::operator()( const void *at )
00042 {
00043     LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00044             << "Deletion for " << this->get() << " called from proxy at offset "
00045             << static_cast<const uint8_t *>( at ) - static_cast<const uint8_t *>( this->get() )
00046             << ", current use_count: " << this->use_count();
00047     this->reset();//actually not needed, but we keep it here to keep obfuscation low
00048 }

00051 const ValuePtrConverterMap &ValuePtrBase::converters()
00052 {
00053     return util::Singletons::get<_internal::ValuePtrConverterMap, 0>();

00055 
00056 const ValuePtrBase::Converter &ValuePtrBase::getConverterTo( unsigned short ID )const
00057 {
00058     const ValuePtrConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( getTypeID() );
00059     LOG_IF( f1 == converters().end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[getTypeID()];
00060     const ValuePtrConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2 = f1->second.find( ID );
00061     LOG_IF( f2 == f1->second.end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[getTypeID()] << " to " << util::getTypeMap()[ID];
00062     return f2->second;
00063 }
00064 
00065 size_t ValuePtrBase::compare( size_t start, size_t end, const _internal::ValuePtrBase &dst, size_t dst_start ) const
00066 {
00067     assert( start <= end );
00068     size_t ret = 0;
00069     size_t _length = end - start;
00070 
00071     if ( dst.getTypeID() != getTypeID() ) {
00072         LOG( Debug, error )
00073                 << "Comparing to a ValuePtr of different type(" << dst.getTypeName() << ", not " << getTypeName()
00074                 << "). Assuming all voxels to be different";
00075         return _length;
00076     }
00077 
00078     LOG_IF( end >= getLength(), Runtime, error )
00079             << "End of the range (" << end << ") is behind the end of this ValuePtr (" << getLength() << ")";
00080     LOG_IF( _length + dst_start >= dst.getLength(), Runtime, error )
00081             << "End of the range (" << _length + dst_start << ") is behind the end of the destination (" << dst.getLength() << ")";
00082 
00083     // lock the memory so we can mem-compare the elements (use uint8_t because some compilers do not like arith on void*)
00084     const boost::shared_ptr<const uint8_t>
00085     src_s = boost::static_pointer_cast<const uint8_t>( getRawAddress() ),
00086     dst_s = boost::static_pointer_cast<const uint8_t>( dst.getRawAddress() );
00087     const uint8_t *src_p = src_s.get(), *dst_p = dst_s.get();
00088     const size_t el_size = bytesPerElem();
00089 
00090     for ( size_t i = start; i < end; i++ ) {
00091         if ( memcmp( src_p + ( i * el_size ), dst_p + ( i * el_size ), el_size ) != 0 )
00092             ret++;
00093     }
00094 
00095     return ret;
00096 }

00099 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::copyByID( unsigned short ID, scaling_pair scaling ) const
00100 {
00101     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( ID );
00102 
00103     if( conv ) {
00104         boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase> ret;
00105         conv->generate( *this, ret, getScaling( scaling, ID ) );
00106         return *ret;
00107     } else {
00108         LOG( Runtime, error )
00109                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00110                 << util::MSubject( getTypeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[ID] );
00111         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool ValuePtrBase::copyTo( isis::data::_internal::ValuePtrBase &dst, scaling_pair scaling ) const
00116 {
00117     const unsigned short dID = dst.getTypeID();
00118     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( dID );
00119 
00120     if( conv ) {
00121         conv->convert( *this, dst, getScaling( scaling, dID ) );
00122         return true;
00123     } else {
00124         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << dst.getTypeName();
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 }

00129 
00130 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::createByID( unsigned short ID, size_t len )
00131 {
00132     const ValuePtrConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( ID );
00133     ValuePtrConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2;
00134 
00135     // try to get a converter to convert the requestet type into itself - they 're there for all known types
00136     if( f1 != converters().end() && ( f2 = f1->second.find( ID ) ) != f1->second.end() ) {
00137         const _internal::ValuePtrConverterBase &conv = *( f2->second );
00138         boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase> ret;
00139         conv.create( ret, len );
00140         return *ret;
00141     } else {
00142         LOG( Debug, error ) << "There is no known creator for " << util::getTypeMap()[ID];
00143         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00144     }
00145 }
00146 
00147 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::convertByID( short unsigned int ID, scaling_pair scaling )
00148 {
00149     scaling = getScaling( scaling, ID );
00150     static const util::Value<uint8_t> one( 1 );
00151     static const util::Value<uint8_t> zero( 0 );
00152 
00153     if( scaling.first->eq( one ) && scaling.second->eq( zero ) && getTypeID() == ID ) { // if type is the same and scaling is 1/0
00154         return *this; //cheap copy
00155     } else {
00156         return copyByID( ID, scaling ); // convert into new
00157     }
00158 }
00159 
00160 ValuePtrBase::Reference ValuePtrBase::cloneToNew( size_t length ) const
00161 {
00162     return createByID( getTypeID(), length );
00163 }

00166 void ValuePtrBase::copyRange( size_t start, size_t end, ValuePtrBase &dst, size_t dst_start )const
00167 {
00168     assert( start <= end );
00169     const size_t len = end - start + 1;
00170     LOG_IF( ! dst.isSameType( *this ), Debug, error )
00171             << "Range copy into a ValuePtr of different type is not supportet. Its " << dst.getTypeName() << " not " << getTypeName();
00172 
00173     if( end >= getLength() ) {
00174         LOG( Runtime, error )
00175                 << "End of the range (" << end << ") is behind the end of this ValuePtr (" << getLength() << ")";
00176     } else if( len + dst_start > dst.getLength() ) {
00177         LOG( Runtime, error )
00178                 << "End of the range (" << len + dst_start << ") is behind the end of the destination (" << dst.getLength() << ")";
00179     } else {
00180         boost::shared_ptr<void> daddr = dst.getRawAddress();
00181         const boost::shared_ptr<const void> saddr = getRawAddress();
00182         const size_t soffset = bytesPerElem() * start; //source offset in bytes
00183         const int8_t *const  src = ( int8_t * )saddr.get();
00184         const size_t doffset = bytesPerElem() * dst_start;//destination offset in bytes
00185         int8_t *const  dest = ( int8_t * )daddr.get();
00186         const size_t blength = len * bytesPerElem();//length in bytes
00187         memcpy( dest + doffset, src + soffset, blength );
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 scaling_pair ValuePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, const std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> &minmax, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00192 {
00193     LOG_IF( minmax.first.isEmpty() || minmax.second.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "One of the ValueReference's in minmax is empty(). This will crash...";
00194     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( typeID );
00195 
00196     if ( conv ) {
00197         return conv->getScaling( *minmax.first, *minmax.second, scaleopt );
00198     } else {
00199         LOG( Runtime, error )
00200                 << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( getTypeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[typeID] );
00201         return scaling_pair();
00202     }
00203 }
00204 size_t ValuePtrBase::useCount() const
00205 {
00206     return getRawAddress().use_count();
00207 }
